price: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun aika Nũhu zuwa ga mutãnensa, sai ya ce: "Yã mutãnẽna! Ku bauta wa Allah. Bã ku da wani abin bautãwa waninsa. Shin, to, bã za ku yi taƙawa ba?"
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi faqāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu afalā tattaqūna
